About Me

Let me tell you a few things about myself...

BIO

Hello, my name is Zachery Anderson and I am currently working on becoming a software engineer. I am attending Neumont College of Computer Science and I am midway through my senior year there. I have about a quarter and a half left before graduation in the fall.

I've always just "gone with flow" and so far its gotten me a lot of fun experiences and has let me meet a lot of interesting people. I know that this is just the next step of this journey we call life and I can't wait to see where I end up afterwards.

Scouting

I am an Eagle Scout and I have spent about eleven years in the Boy Scouts of America's Scouting program and can say without a doubt it has taught me many important life lessons and has given me experiences that I otherwise wouldn't of had.

Gaming/Hobbies

Gaming is a hobby that keeps me thinking. I love the adventure aspect, leveling up, the stories that emerge, the world I help create, and the characters I grow to know. Otherwise I enjoy doing work with my hands, things like woodworking.

Random Information

Things that aren't the other two, but someone somewhere might care about if you want to know more about me.
